tool.name: VSearch search
tool.command:
vsearch
@GENERAL@ --db "$dbfile" #if $dbmask: --dbmask "$dbmask" #end if
##--fulldp full dynamic programming alignment (always on) ##--gapext STRING penalties for gap extension (2I/1E) ##--gapopen STRING penalties for gap opening (20I/2E) $hardmask --id "$id" --iddef "$iddef"
#if str( $qmask ) != 'no': --qmask "$qmask" #end if
## --rowlen INT width of alignment lines in alnout output (64)
$self_param $selfid_param $sizeout --strand "$strand" --usearch_global "$queryfile"
#if '--alnout' in str($outputs).split( "," ): --alnout "$alnout" #end if #if '--blast6out' in str($outputs).split( "," ): --blast6out "$blast6out" #end if #if '--dbmatched' in str($outputs).split( "," ): --dbmatched "$dbmatched" #end if #if '--dbnotmatched' in str($outputs).split( "," ): --dbnotmatched "$dbnotmatched" #end if #if '--fastapairs' in str($outputs).split( "," ): --fastapairs "$fastapairs" #end if #if '--notmatched' in str($outputs).split( "," ): --notmatched "$notmatched" #end if #if '--matched' in str($outputs).split( "," ): --matched "$matched" #end if
#if $adv_opts.adv_opts_selector == "advanced": $adv_opts.top_hits_only $adv_opts.rightjust $adv_opts.leftjust --target_cov "$adv_opts.target_cov" --query_cov "$adv_opts.query_cov"
#if str( $adv_opts.maxid ): --maxid "$adv_opts.maxid" #end if #if str( $adv_opts.maxqt ): --maxqt "$adv_opts.maxqsize" #end if #if str( $adv_opts.maxsizeratio ): --maxsizeratio "$adv_opts.maxsizeratio" #end if #if str( $adv_opts.maxsl ): --maxsl "$adv_opts.maxsl" #end if #if str( $adv_opts.mid ): --mid "$adv_opts.mid" #end if #if str( $adv_opts.minqt ): --minqt "$adv_opts.minqt" #end if #if str( $adv_opts.minsizeratio ): --minsizeratio "$adv_opts.minseqlength" #end if #if str( $adv_opts.minsl ): --minsl "$adv_opts.minsl" #end if
#if str( $adv_opts.mintsize ): --mintsize "$adv_opts.mintsize" #end if #if str( $adv_opts.mismatch ): --mismatch "$adv_opts.mismatch" #end if #if str( $adv_opts.maxqsize ): --maxqsize "$adv_opts.maxqsize" #end if #if str( $adv_opts.mincols ): --mincols "$adv_opts.mincols" #end if #if str( $adv_opts.maxsubs ): --maxsubs "$adv_opts.maxsubs" #end if #if str( $adv_opts.maxrejects ): --maxrejects "$adv_opts.maxrejects" #end if #if str( $adv_opts.maxaccepts ): --maxaccepts "$adv_opts.maxaccepts" #end if #if str( $adv_opts.maxdiffs ): --maxdiffs "$adv_opts.maxdiffs" #end if #if str( $adv_opts.maxgaps ): --maxgaps "$adv_opts.maxgaps" #end if #if str( $adv_opts.maxhits ): --maxhits "$adv_opts.maxhits" #end if #if str( $adv_opts.match ): --match "$adv_opts.match" #end if #if str( $adv_opts.idprefix ): --idprefix "$adv_opts.idprefix" #end if #if str( $adv_opts.idsuffix ): --idsuffix str( $adv_opts.idsuffix ) #end if
#if $adv_opts.uclust_output.uclust_output_select == 'yes': --uc "$uc" $adv_opts.uclust_output.uc_allhits #end if
#if $adv_opts.userfields_output.userfields_output_select == 'yes': --userfields '#echo '+'.join( str($adv_opts.userfields_output.userfields).split(',') )#' --userout "$userout" #end if
##--weak_id REAL include aligned hits with >= id; continue search --wordlength "$adv_opts.wordlength"
$adv_opts.output_no_hits
#end if

param.name: queryfile
param.label: Select your query FASTA file

param.name: dbfile
param.label: Select your database FASTA file

param.name: dbmask
param.label: Mask database sequences

expand.option: FASTA file for matching database sequences
FASTA file for non-matching database sequences
Write non-matching query sequences to separate file
Write matching query sequences to separate file

param.name: adv_opts_selector
param.label: Advanced Options

param.name: top_hits_only
param.label: Output only hits with identity equal to the best

param.name: rightjust
param.label: Reject if terminal gaps at alignment right end

param.name: leftjust
param.label: Reject if terminal gaps at alignment left end

param.name: query_cov
param.label: Reject if fraction of query seq. aligned lower than this value

param.name: target_cov
param.label: Reject if fraction of target seq. aligned lower than this value

param.name: maxid
param.label: Reject if identity higher than this value

param.name: maxqt
param.label: Reject if query/target length ratio higher than this value

param.name: maxsizeratio
param.label: Reject if query/target abundance ratio higher than this value

param.name: maxsl
param.label: Reject if shorter/longer length ratio higher than this value

param.name: mid
param.label: Reject if percent identity lower than this value, ignoring gaps

param.name: minqt
param.label: Reject if query/target length ratio lower than this value

param.name: minsl
param.label: Reject if shorter/longer length ratio lower than this value

param.name: minsizeratio
param.label: Reject if query/target abundance ratio lower than this value

param.name: maxqsize
param.label: Reject if query abundance larger than this value

param.name: mincols
param.label: Reject if alignment length shorter than this value

param.name: maxsubs
param.label: Reject if more substitutions than this value

param.name: maxdiffs
param.label: Reject if more substitutions or indels than this value

param.name: maxgaps
param.label: Reject if more indels than this value

param.name: maxhits
param.label: Maximum number of hits to show

param.name: match
param.label: Score for match

param.name: idprefix
param.label: Reject if first n nucleotides do not match

param.name: idsuffix
param.label: Reject if last n nucleotides do not match

param.name: mintsize
param.label: Reject if target abundance lower

param.name: mismatch
param.label: Score for mismatch

param.name: uclust_output_select
param.label: UCLUST-like output

param.name: uc_allhits
param.label: Show all, not just top hits

param.name: wordlength
param.label: Length of words for database index 3-15

param.name: output_no_hits
param.label: Write non-matching queries to the output file
